Package entities

Class GameLoop

java.lang.Object
entities.GameLoop
public class GameLoop extends Object
Main class handling all the relevant game logic Includes the main game loop, controlling game flow

  • Constructor Details

    • GameLoop

      public GameLoop​(boolean rff, boolean manualNextMsg, int sleepTime, boolean dataFromDB, boolean showGui)
      Constructor of the game loop, used to configure the game
      Parameters:
      rff - should the stack be loaded from file
      manualNextMsg - does the player control the game himself
      sleepTime - time between messages
      dataFromDB - should game be loaded from database
      showGui - should a gui be used or the console

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Call this function to run the game Handles creation of players and starts the loop (Never returns)

    • showActions

      public void showActions()
      Function to display all past actions of this game

    • historyUpdate

      public void historyUpdate​(Player active)
      Add the last round to the gameHistory
      Parameters:
      active - last active player

    • load

      public void load​(Storage oldGame)
      Overwrites all important information of the current game with a new game
      Parameters:
      oldGame - Game that should be loaded

    • manipulate

      public void manipulate​(Round newStatus)
      Function to manipulate the current game state Used for undo and redo mechanics
      Parameters:
      newStatus - Runde, von der weiter gespielt werden soll

    • calculatePassword

      public int calculatePassword​(String password)
      calculates the password that will be saved in textfile
      Parameters:
      password - password to be turned into a hash
      Returns:
      password as hash

    • validatePassword

      public boolean validatePassword​(String expected, String entered)
      calculates if entered password matches password in textfile
      Parameters:
      expected - value for that password
      entered - useres values
      Returns:
      true if password is valid, false if not

    • createHistory

      creates history for current round
      Parameters:

      Returns:
